title: Ticket #1592: Directory::Recursive_Chown(char*, char*) needs to be unit tested
description: Directory::Recursive_Chown(const char *username, const char *domain) is currently only implemented on windows. When the unit tests get working on windows, tests should be added to the Directory object unit tests for this function.
